means: 分配，拨给，摊派( allot的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: We were allotted half an hour to address the committee.
sentence.Network_cn: 给了我们半个小时向委员会作陈述。

sentence.Network_en: I completed the test within the time allotted .
sentence.Network_cn: 我在限定的时间内完成了试验。

sentence.Network_en: Each passenger slept on the berth allotted to him.
sentence.Network_cn: 每个旅客都睡在分配给他的铺位上.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 卡扎菲：语不惊人誓不休(1)- 双语新闻 - 21英语网 ... protocol 草案， 协议，礼仪 allotted 被定量的 robe 长袍.
the government allotted a stretch of land to each settler ., 政府分配给每个居民一块地.
allotted a house to live in ., 他们分到了一幢住房.
Thus I am allotted months of boredom and nights of grief and misery ., 这样 , 我也只有承受失意的岁月 , 为我注定的苦痛长夜.

allotment 分配；配股allotment notice 股份配售通知；配股通知allotment of shares 股份分配

entry.def: If something is allotted to someone, it is given to them as their share.

example.ex: The seats are allotted to the candidates who have won the most votes...
example.tran: 席位被分配给了赢得选票最多的候选人。

example.ex: We were allotted half an hour to address the committee.
example.tran: 给了我们半个小时向委员会作陈述。

auth_sentence.content: Congress allotted and mandated alcohol under Bush.
auth_sentence.res_content: Congress allotted and mandated alcohol under Bush.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Congress allotted and mandated alcohol under Bush.

auth_sentence.content: Find a ladder and peel it back to its allotted territory.
auth_sentence.res_content: Find a ladder and peel it back to its allotted territory.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Find a ladder and peel it back to its allotted territory.

auth_sentence.content: I allotted to each of my family what they were to do.
auth_sentence.res_content: I allotted to each of my family what they were to do.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I allotted to each of my family what they were to do.
